items.text: flat-batted to long-on, refuses the single. Actually not, eventually takes it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Joseph, 1 run

items.text: spins away to hit him on the body as he tries to defend.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: arches back to avoid this skiddy bouncer
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: punched to deep cover for an easy single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: floats this full on the stumps, blocked.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: bursts through Mosaddek's hands at mid-off and goes to the boundary.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Joseph, FOUR runs

items.text: right into the blockhole, gets a thick inside edge to short fine
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Joseph, no run

items.text: full toss that slips down leg, nearly above the waist. Mushfiqur puts his left hand out and stops that
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Joseph, 1 wide

items.text: thick inside edge off the pad as this rolls into the off side, went for a wild heave again
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Joseph, 1 run

items.text: backs away and punches this to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, blocked back
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, no run

items.text: carved away towards deep point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Joseph, 1 run

items.text: backs away and looks to club this over mid-off, toe-ends it to the fielder.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: cuts back in to beat the inside edge and hit the pad
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: forces this off the frontfoot to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: backs away and belts this length ball back to the stumps at the bowler's end, takes a run off the deflection
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: floats this wide as he sees the batsman backing away, left alone.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Joseph, no run

items.text: heaves across the line to deep midwicket where there's a misfield that gives them a boundary when it should've just been a single. Mosaddek the man there
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, FOUR runs

items.text: swung away, Mehidy running backwards from midwicket can't get there. Just eludes him.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, 2 runs

items.text: pulled towards wide long-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: full and straight on the stumps, eased to long-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Joseph, 1 run

items.text: swing and a miss. This was a short ball angling away, he played too early.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, no run

items.text: muscles this pull on the bounce to the deep midwicket fence. Sat up nicely, he picked his spot well.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bishoo, FOUR runs

items.text: carves this low full toss towards deep point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Joseph, 1 run

items.text: backs away to drive, ends up squeezing back a yorker to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run
